clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fatigue.
findings: Collapse of right middle lobe lobe with volume loss.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 49 mm in diameter.
Focal consolidation in right middle lobe with air bronchogram.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in right middle lobe.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right middle lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
